sys_hub_flow.name: System Enhancement Flow

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description={{Created_1.current.record_producer.sys_name}} - Review Work - {{0ddd7ed1-78cc-45b1-8880-d4b59877c0d4.requested_for.name}}^description=1. Review the case and provide resolution information (close code and close notes) before closing the case 2. Close this task by updating the state field on the task and click 'Update'^assignment_group={{Created_1.current.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{4f4d5139-9a5f-4af2-bebc-9984b25e5cc4.record.assigned_to}}^fsm_case={{Created_1.current.sys_id}}

fsm_case={{Created_1.current.sys_id}}^short_description={{Created_1.current.record_producer.sys_name}} - Conduct Assessment - {{0ddd7ed1-78cc-45b1-8880-d4b59877c0d4.requested_for.name}}^description=1. Set 'Assigned to' to the user working the task and update state to 'Work in Progress' 2. Review and validate all information from requester is complete 3. Identify stakeholders involved 4. Schedule and hold system enhancement review discussion 5. Update enhancement classification based on discussion 6. Present to Governance Council if the enhancement is classified as “exceptional circumstance” and as required 7. Resolve and close the task once completed^assignment_group={{Created_1.current.assignment_group}}

short_description={{Created_1.current.record_producer.sys_name}} - Review Work - {{0ddd7ed1-78cc-45b1-8880-d4b59877c0d4.requested_for.name}}^description=1. sys_hub_flow_snapshot.name: System Enhancement Flow

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description={{Created_1.current.record_producer.sys_name}} - Review Work - {{0ddd7ed1-78cc-45b1-8880-d4b59877c0d4.requested_for.name}}^description=1. Review the case and provide resolution information (close code and close notes) before closing the case 2. Close this task by updating the state field on the task and click 'Update'^assignment_group={{Created_1.current.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{4f4d5139-9a5f-4af2-bebc-9984b25e5cc4.record.assigned_to}}^fsm_case={{Created_1.current.sys_id}}

short_description={{Created_1.current.record_producer.sys_name}} - Review Work - {{0ddd7ed1-78cc-45b1-8880-d4b59877c0d4.requested_for.name}}^description=1. Review the case and provide resolution information (close code and close notes) before closing the case 2. Close this task by updating the state field on the task and click 'Update'^assignment_group={{Created_1.current.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{4f4d5139-9a5f-4af2-bebc-9984b25e5cc4.record.assigned_to}}^fsm_case={{Created_1.current.sys_id}}

fsm_case={{Created_1.current.sys_id}}^short_description={{Created_1.current.record_producer.sys_name}} - Conduct Assessment - {{0ddd7ed1-78cc-45b1-8880-d4b59877c0d4.requested_for.name}}^description=1. Set 'Assigned to' to the user working the task and update state to 'Work in Progress' 2. Review and validate all information from requester is complete 3. Identify stakeholders involved 4. Schedule and hold system enhancement review discussion 5. Update enhancement classification based on discussion 6. Present to Governance Council if the enhancement is classified as “exceptional circumstance” and as required 7. Resolve and close the task once completed^assignment_group={{Created_1.current.assignment_group}}
